answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Thomas,
I haven't found anything on cities in Maryland using the Lean Six Sigma approach, but I did find a white paper from Erie County, NY that documents their experience with the approach and some of the outcomes.  I hope this helps.

answers.author: Jim Bugg
answers.text:
Thomas,
Good to see others intersted in this. I am not sure about Maryland but one of the best examples of municipal use of Six Sigma is Fort Wayne, Indiana: Follow the link below
http://www.cityoffortwayne.org/lean-six-sigma-project-summaries.html

author: Thomas Reynolds
text:
Are there any municipalities in Maryland with experience applying a Lean Six Sigma approach to local government manage?  If so, are you able to share any information about the effort?
Thanks,
Tom Reynolds
Maryland Municipal League
title: six sigma
